00001 #include <stdio.h>
00002 #include <math.h>
00003 #include "Lgm/Lgm_QuadPack.h"

00010 #define TRACE_TOL   1e-7
00011 #define GOLD        0.38197
00012 
00013 
00014 
00015 double Func( double Kt, double Alpha,Lgm_LstarInfo *LstarInfo );
00016 
00017 
00018 /*
00019  *   This routine returns the pitch angle that corresponds to a given value of K
00020  *   K = sqrt(Bm)I
00021  *
00022  */
00023 
00024 double  AlphaOfK( double K,Lgm_LstarInfo *LstarInfo ) {
00025 
00026     double  a0, a1, a;
00027     double  f0, f1, f;
00028     int     done;
00029 
00030 
00031     /*
00032      *  Set up low side of bracket.
00033      */
00034     a0 = 10.0;
00035     f0 = Func( K, a0, LstarInfo );
00036     if ( fabs(f0) < 1e-4 ) return( a0 );
00037 
00038 
00039     /*
00040      *  Set up high side of bracket.
00041      */
00042     a1 = 90.0;
00043     f1 = Func( K, a1, LstarInfo );
00044     if ( fabs(f1) < 1e-4 ) return( a1 );
00045 
00046 
00047 
00048     /*
00049      *  If the vals are not opposite signs, we dont have a proper bracket.
00050      */
00051     if ( f0*f1 > 0.0 ) {
00052         printf("AlphaOfK: [a0:a1] = [%g: %g] does not bracket root?\n", a0, a1);
00053         return(-9e99);
00054     }
00055 
00056 
00057     done = FALSE;
00058     while( !done ) {
00059 
00060         /*
00061          * compute a new PA to test
00062          */
00063         //a = (a1-a0)*GOLD + a0;
00064         a = (a1-a0)*0.5 + a0;
00065         f = Func( K, a, LstarInfo );
00066 
00067         if ( fabs(a1-a0) < 1e-2 ) {
00068             done = TRUE;
00069         } else if ( f1*f < 0.0 ) {
00070             /*
00071              *  Root must be in [a:a1]
00072              *  Reset brackets.
00073              */
00074             a0 = a;
00075             f0 = f;
00076         } else {
00077             /*
00078              *  Root must be in [a0:a]
00079              *  Reset brackets.
00080              */
00081             a1 = a;
00082             f1 = f;
00083         }
00084 
00085     }
00086 
00087     /*
00088      * Take the midpoint of the remaining bracket range as the answer.
00089      */
00090     a = 0.5*(a0+a1);
00091 
00092     return( a );
00093 
00094 
00095 
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 /*
00100  *  This function returns the difference between
00101  *  the target K and the K(Alpha). I.e.;
00102  *
00103  *      Func = K - K(Alpha)
00104  *
00105  *  On a plot of f(Alpha) vs Alpha, the value starts out
00106  *  negative for low pitch angles and crosses zero at some
00107  *  PA, then goes positive. 
00108  */
00109 double Func( double Kt, double Alpha,Lgm_LstarInfo *LstarInfo ) {
00110 
00111     double  sa, sa2, Sma, Smb, I, K;
00112 
00113 
00114     LstarInfo->PitchAngle = Alpha;
00115     sa = sin( Alpha*RadPerDeg ); sa2 = sa*sa;
00116     LstarInfo->mInfo->Bm =LstarInfo->mInfo->Blocal/sa2; 
00117 
00118     /*
00119      * Trace from Bmin point up to northern mirror point and down to
00120      * southern mirror point. Sma and Smb are the distances along
00121      * (i.e. up and down) the FL from the Bmin point.
00122      */
00123      if ( Lgm_TraceToMirrorPoint( &(LstarInfo->mInfo->Pmin), &(LstarInfo->mInfo->Pm_South), &Sma, 120.0, LstarInfo->mInfo->Bm, -1.0, LstarInfo->mInfo->Lgm_TraceToMirrorPoint_Tol, LstarInfo->mInfo ) ) {
00124         if ( Lgm_TraceToMirrorPoint( &(LstarInfo->mInfo->Pm_South), &(LstarInfo->mInfo->Pm_North), &Smb, 120.0, LstarInfo->mInfo->Bm,  1.0, LstarInfo->mInfo->Lgm_TraceToMirrorPoint_Tol, LstarInfo->mInfo ) ) {
00125 
00126             
00127             /*
00128              *  Set the limits of integration. Also set tolerances for
00129              *  Quadpack routines.
00130              */
00131             //LstarInfo->mInfo->Sm_South = LstarInfo->mInfo->smin - Sma;
00132             //LstarInfo->mInfo->Sm_North = LstarInfo->mInfo->smin + Smb;
00133             LstarInfo->mInfo->Sm_South = 0.0;
00134             LstarInfo->mInfo->Sm_North = Smb;
00135 //            LstarInfo->mInfo->epsrel = 0.0;
00136 //            LstarInfo->mInfo->epsabs = 1e-1;
00137 //            LstarInfo->mInfo->Lgm_I_Integrator  = DQK21;
00138 //            LstarInfo->mInfo->UseInterpRoutines = TRUE;
00139 
00140             /*
00141              *  Since the Pm_South and Pm_north points are not likely
00142              *  to be in the interped array, add them (since we have
00143              *  them now anyway!). This is particularly important to do
00144              *  for the Sb integrals because the integrand is high near
00145              *  the mirror points.  If we dont do it, we could get
00146              *  slight differences due to it.
00147              */
00148             FreeSpline( LstarInfo->mInfo );
00149             //AddNewPoint( LstarInfo->mInfo->smin-Sma, LstarInfo->mInfo->Bm, &LstarInfo->mInfo->Pm_South, LstarInfo->mInfo );
00150             //AddNewPoint( LstarInfo->mInfo->smin+Smb, LstarInfo->mInfo->Bm, &LstarInfo->mInfo->Pm_North, LstarInfo->mInfo );
00151             AddNewPoint( 0.0, LstarInfo->mInfo->Bm, &LstarInfo->mInfo->Pm_South, LstarInfo->mInfo );
00152             AddNewPoint( Smb, LstarInfo->mInfo->Bm, &LstarInfo->mInfo->Pm_North, LstarInfo->mInfo );
00153             InitSpline( LstarInfo->mInfo );
00154 //            LstarInfo->mInfo->UseInterpRoutines = TRUE;
00155 
00156             if (  LstarInfo->mInfo->UseInterpRoutines ) {
00157 
00158                 /*
00159                  *  Do interped I integral.
00160                  */
00161                 I = Iinv_interped( LstarInfo->mInfo  );
00162                 if (LstarInfo->VerbosityLevel >= 2) printf("Iinv (Interped Integral) = %g\n",  I );
00163 
00164             } else {
00165 
00166                 /*
00167                  *  Do full blown I integral. 
00168                  */
00169                 I = Iinv( LstarInfo->mInfo  );
00170                 if (LstarInfo->VerbosityLevel >= 2) printf("Iinv (Full Integral) = %g\n",  I );
00171 
00172             }
00173 
00174 
00175             /*
00176              *  Compute K(Alpha) (units of G^1/2 Re)
00177              */
00178             K = 3.16227766e-3*I*sqrt(LstarInfo->mInfo->Bm);
00179 
00180 
00181             /*
00182              *  return the diff
00183              */
00184             return( Kt - K );
00185 
00186 
00187         }
00188      }
00189 
00190      return( -9e99 );
00191 
00192 
00193 }
